# Producing the documentation for this package

The web page for this package has been produced using `pkgdown`. The following command has to be run before pushing to github:
```
pkgdown::build_site()
```


## How to install pkgdown

```
httr::set_config(httr::use_proxy(url="http://www-proxy.helsenord.no", port=8080)) # Behind HN proxy
devtools::install_github("r-lib/pkgdown")
```
